summary: I GOT A FLAT TIRE WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY.  I USED THE JACK ISSUED BY GENERAL MOTORS TO LIFT UP MY CAR TO CHANGE MY TIRE.  I PROCEEDED TO REMOVE THE FLAT TIRE  WHEN THE JACK BROKE AND DROPPED MY CAR ON THE GROUND WITH NO TIRE FOR SUPPORT. I WAS NOT PHYSICALLY INJURED BUT IT WAS QUITE POSSIBLE THAT I COULD HAVE BEEN HAD I NOT BEEN BENDING OVER TO CHANGE THE TIRE.    *NLM
